special_text:
When Mara enters, seize The Core.
[+1]: Teach target creature you control lifelink. [i](Put a lifelink counter on it. If it already has lifelink, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
[+1]: Create a 1/1 white Rebel Soldier creature token.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Pay {E}: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn.”
notes:
!addtoken Energy Reserve; The Core; Rebel Soldier; Mara, Hand of the Core Emblem;
!token Energy Reserve VRN; The Core VRN; Rebel Soldier VRN; Mara, Hand of the Core Emblem VRN;
